name: Gyre (TheWillgamer)
description:
Play in 1080p for the best experience.

Avoid the rocks and worms, and collect fuel to survive.

Controls:
Arrow Keys to Navigate. Spacebar to Boost and Hold to Shoot. R to Restart.

Credits:
William Jeon (Programming/Design)
Oscar Amarillas Diaz (Programming)
Kevin Touch (Programming)
Henry Nguyen (Art/Design)
Anthony Cano (Art/Design)

Sound Effects used (edited):
- Dentist Drill Sound by Mike Koenig (http://soundbible.com/1068-Dentist-Drill.html)
- Drilling Sound by Mike Koenig (http://soundbible.com/1108-Drilling.html)
- Crumbling Sound by Mike Koenig (http://soundbible.com/1886-Crumbling.html)
- Anti Aircraft Gun Sound by Mike Koenig (http://soundbible.com/7-Anti-Aircraft-Gun.html)
-Coins 1 by ProjectsU0120 (https://freesound.org/people/ProjectsU012/sounds/341695/)

Song:
Arcade Music Loop by joshuaempyre (https://freesound.org/people/joshuaempyre/sounds/251461/)
